meanings: benefit, advantage, gain, interest, good, (formal) profit
give the bottom of the oven a hard scrape
consider the gains and the losses

examples.korean: a mutually beneficial/supportive relationship 발음듣기 서로 득/힘이 되는 관계 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
This is a win-win situation all around. 발음듣기 이것은 모두가 두루 득을 볼 수 있는 상황이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This is a win-win situation all around. 발음

examples.korean: I find (that) it pays to be honest. 발음듣기 나는 정직한 게 득이 된다는 것을 (경험으로) 안다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I find (that) it pays to be honest. 발음

examples.korean: And the moral is that crime doesn’t pay. 발음듣기 그리고 그 교훈은 범죄가 득이 안 된다는 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: And the moral is that crime doesn’t pay. 발음

examples.korean: Who exactly stands to benefit from these changes? 발음듣기 이들 변화로 득을 보는 사람이 정확히 누구죠? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Who exactly stands to benefit from these changes? 발음
